resources.string:
Official FetLife App v%1$s


Got Bugs?

If you find a bug please start by reading through the current list of open issues and if you can\'t find anything about your bug please submit a new bug at our GitHub page:
https://github.com/fetlife/android/issues


Need help or want to know more?

Visit our GitHub page to access Trouble Shooting Guide, get more information about current and upcoming releases and many more:
https://github.com/fetlife/android/


Version History

v2.15.0

  • Smaller bug fixes

v2.14.7

  • Fix for Video upload description issue
  • Improvement in opening Stacked group comment notifications

v2.14.5

  • Added new video events to Explore section feeds
  • Bugfixes

v2.14.3

  • Fresh & Pervy

v2.13.5

  • Kinky & Popular

v2.13.2

  • Stuff you Love

v2.13.0

  • Writings

v2.12.21

  • Download support for updates
  • List of Members Groups
  • List of Group Members
  • Groups related fixes

v2.12.19

  • Join / leave group
  • Follow / unfollow group discussion

v2.12.0

  • Mention links in messages lead to user profiles
  • Auto extend helper for mentions after using @ character
  • Add pictures to your share list with the share icon on picture overlay
  • Share pictures from your share list or recently viewed pictures in conversations or group discussions

v2.11.16

  • Removed preview flag

v2.11.15

  • Crash fixes

v2.11.14

  • Groups
  • App Download Page

v2.10.3

  • Support
  • Ads
  • Kinktionary

v2.10.0

  • Important security update

v2.9.12

  • Crash fix
  • Support for install on SD card
  • Fix for stuck message about connection issues
  • Directly opening conversation from notification
  • Check for update fix

v2.9.11

  • Hot fix for resending rejected friend requests
  • Small Profile Screen improvement
  • Fix for Profile Screen refresh after relationship change
  • Several crash fixes

v2.9.7

  • List of My Events
  • Search Events by Tag

v2.9.5

  • Frequent Login issue fix
  • List Members set RSVP to an event
  • Set RSVP for an Event from Event Detail Screen

v2.9.2

  • Event Details Screen
  • Add Events to Calendar from the Event Details Screen

v2.9.0

  • EventMap

v2.8.10

  • Fix issue with image upload

v2.8.0

  • Improved Notification Settings

v2.7.0

  • Find Member by Name
  • Start conversation via Profile Screen only
  • Frequent login fix

v2.6.25

  • Profile screen
  • On-Device Video Stream

v2.5.6

  • Video Upload
  • Feed Image Scaling improvement
  • Improved logging
  • Improved message ordering
  • Auto check for updates
  • Fix for incorrect badge counter (one time clean up needed)
  • Improved message ordering
  • Code improved to avoid the same message sent twice
  • Usage of default privacy settings for notifications

v2.4.0

  • Improved Conversation Layout (User Avatar, Direct link to user profile)
  • Fixed issue of incorrect order of sent messages
  • Improved bug tracking

v2.3.2

  • Image crop before upload
  • Improved retry strategy for pending messages
  • Fixed back button behavior at the Settings screen
  • Fixed issue with setting messages read from the App

v2.2.1

  • Security Improvements
  • Merging Vanilla and Kinky versions into one App
  • Image upload Fix

v2.1.3

  • Saving typed but not sent messages as a draft in case of accidentally or intentionally leaving a conversation
  • Fix for crash after opening notification in case of using Feed as a starting screen
  • Fix for unexpected app exiting after pressing the back button in case of using Feed as a starting screen
  • Fix for connection issues after sending to long first message during initiating a conversation (regression fix)
  • Fix for connection failed toast when starting a new conversation even if the message sending was successful
  • Fix for archived conversation were still visible in the App and caused connection issues when they tried to be opened
  • Fix for unfriended members still appeared in the App Friend list
  • Removed unused pull to refresh functionality from App Notification History Screen
  • Fix for empty Fetish Into feed items

v2.0.0

  • Feed
  • Pull to refresh

v1.7

  • Caption for picture upload

v1.6

  • Default Emoji Support

v1.5

  • Notification Settings
  • Auto password protection
  • Kinky and Vanilla version (separate Apps)

v1.4

  • Picture upload
  • Timestamp field for Notification History Items
  • Clear All menu option for Notification History

v1.3

  • Receive broader set of Notification
  • View your Notification History
  • Get information about new features at about screen
  • Use hardware menu button for opening the menu

v1.2

  • Share your profile with others via NFC beam
  • Accept shared profiles and create a new friend request at Friend Requests screen

v1.1

  • View your list of incoming, pending friend requests
  • Approve or Reject your pending friend requests

v1.0

  • View your list of Conversations
  • Read and respond to Conversations
  • View your list of Friends
  • Start new Conversation with a Friend
  • Receive a push notification when you receive a new Message

Show Activity Feed Screen after opening the App
Use FL instead of FetLife as App name and use simple FL icon instead of FetLife logo as an App icon

Enable Notifications for incoming Friend Requests
Enable Notifications about new preview releases
Enable Notifications for any other event
Enable Notifications about your stuff Loved by other users
Enable Notifications about your stuff commented by other users
Enable Notifications about you got mentioned by other users
Manage settings relevant to your FetLife App Profile
Make the app to ask password each time after the App was sent to the background
Clear all data related to current FetLife profile stored on this device. Also logs out you out and disable any further notifications sent to this user
Select your Notification Ringtone.\nTo select a custom Notification first copy your notification file to the Notifications folder of your device.
Do you really want to delete all App local user data and logout?\nYou won\'t receive App notifications until you log in again

is maybe going to an event
Settings about how the feed stories should be displayed on the feed screen
Auto expand feed stories about when a followed user loved something
Auto expand feed stories about when a followed user became friends with someone
Auto expand feed stories about various profile related changes
Auto expand feed stories about user comments
Auto expand feed stories about when a user posted new a writing
Auto expand feed stories about when a user got interested in an event
Auto expand feed stories about when a user got interested in a group
Auto expand feed stories about when a user uploaded a new picture or video
Swipe right to accept; left to reject

Please turn on NFC to enable this feature
Tap your device to another Android device to activate the beam

Check out what\'s new in v%1$s at \'Release Notes\'
New FetLife App Stable Version is available
New FetLife App Preview version is available

You are already Friends.\nDo you want to cancel your friendship?
You are not friends yet. Do you want to send a Friend Request?
Friend request is waiting for your approval.\nDo you want to check it out now?
Friend request has been already sent.\nDo you want to cancel it?
Your settings has been reset to their default value.\nPlease take a minute after login to reset them to the desired values.
No update found\nYou are using the latest version
Picture added to your share list
Did you read the description and do you agree with the rules of this group?
Please confirm you want to leave this group
You are no longer following the discussion
New FetLife App version is ready to install

Sending messsage to this member is not possible, beceause either the member is inactive/deleted or one of you has blocked the other
